welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Heide, Germany! Located in the beautiful state of Schleswig-Holstein, this charming city is known for its picturesque landscapes, delicious cuisine, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Heide has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rendsburg Schachtholm Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rendsburg Schachtholm Airport, handling all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
